name: Carl Against the Sea
description:
Carl is a little pirate that likes to travel around the world. But this time, big colorful sea monsters will make his adventure a lot less safe than usual. The canons on his ship are a bit old and like a roll of the dice. So Carl is going to need your help to fight off these monsters with your well known ship tactics.
Good luck !

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME:

GAME'S DEVELOPMENT:
Carl Against the Sea is a game made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022. Our team is really proud of this game and looking forward to making little updates to polish the game in the near future.

CREDITS:
Code & Game Design by Pirhana
Art by Bentot
Music & SFX by R2Jeu
